Race.SpecificTitle: Member -- Greater Lafourche Port Commission, Division A
Member -- Greater Lafourche Port Commission, Division C
Member -- Greater Lafourche Port Commission, Division H
Fire Prot. Dist. No. 4 -- 8.45 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 4 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 8.45 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN THE DISTRICT INCLUDING THE PURCHASE OF FIRE TRUCKS.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 4 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of eight and forty-five hundredths (8.45) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in the District, including the purchase of fire trucks?

Race.SpecificTitle: S. Lafourche Levee Dist. -- 1% S&U - BOC
Race.SummaryText:
SOUTH LAFOURCHE LEVEE DISTRICT PROPOSITION
(SALES TAX)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY FOR SOUTH LAFOURCHE LEVEE DISTRICT TO LEVY A 1% SALES AND USE TAX TO BE USED FOR THE PURPOSE OF CONSTRUCTING AND MAINTAINING NECESSARY LEVEES, LEVEE DRAINAGE, FLOOD PROTECTION AND FOR ALL OTHER PURPOSES INCIDENTAL THERETO AND FURTHER AUTHORITY TO FUND THE PROCEEDS OF THE TAX INTO BONDS FOR THE AFORESAID PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall the South Lafourche Levee District (the "District"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, with the avails or proceeds of the Tax, after paying costs of collection and administration (the "Avails"), to be dedicated and used, after making all necessary payments in connection with any bonds payable from said Tax, for the purpose of constructing and maintaining necessary levees, levee drainage, flood protection and for all other purposes incidental thereto and shall the District be authorized to fund the Avails into bonds for any of the capital purposes set forth above, for paying costs of issuance and funding necessary reserves for the payment of such bonds, all in accordance with Sub-Part F, Part III, Chapter 4, Title 39 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes?
